### Code and Logs

```python
from kivy.app import App
from kivy.lang import Builder

kv = """
Screen:
    # KV-Code
"""


class MainApp(App):
    def build(self):
        self.root = Builder.load_string(kv)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    MainApp().run()
```
